meanings.definition: Reach a climax or point of highest development.
meanings.sent1: The concert will culminate with a spectacular fireworks display.
meanings.sent2: The project will culminate in a final presentation next week.
meanings.sent3: The race to the finish line will culminate in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The journey of self-discovery can culminate in a profound realization.
meanings.sent5: The suspenseful movie will culminate in a thrilling chase scene.

meanings.sent1: The negotiations will culminate in a signed agreement.
meanings.sent2: The school year will culminate in a graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle-solving challenge will culminate in a victory dance.
meanings.sent4: The story will culminate in a heartwarming reunion.
meanings.sent5: The building project will culminate in a grand opening event.
